attributes.action: Publicly commiserate over each death of a UK citizen (Jade Goody clause)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM should make a personal effort to commiserate with each family, in public, over any deaths they suffer, in keeping with his public commiseration over the death of Jade Goody.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
